s** length of text and line match
.

s** mixing math, text and lines
.
\frame{
  \setlength{\unitlength}{1cm}
  \begin{picture}(6,5)
    \thicklines
    \put(1,0.5){\line(2,1){3}}
    \put(4,2){\line(-2,1){2}}
    \put(2,3){\line(-2,-5){1}}
    \put(0.7,0.3){$A$}
    \put(4.05,1.9){$B$}
    \put(1.7,2.95){$C$}
    \put(3.1,2.5){$a$}
    \put(1.3,1.7){$b$}
    \put(2.5,1.05){$c$}
    \put(0.3,4){$F=\sqrt{s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)}$}
    \put(3.5,0.4){$\displaystyle s:=\frac{a+b+c}{2}$}
  \end{picture}
}
